name: BossMan
description:
Greetings from StufCo, the stuff company!

Would you like a potentially lucrative career with the finest makers of artisanal widgets and handcrafted doohickeys in all the land? Of course, you do! Take part in StufCo's Accelerated Management Training (SAcMaT) today!

BossMan is a 2D, top-down management survival simulation. You're the boss, and it is your job to make money by motivating unpaid interns to make widgets. Your form of motivation is a baseball bat. The interns will shank you. Failure to make widgets will result in termination by gassing. Survive for 28 days, and you might just find yourself with a more permanent position at the finest manufacturer of handmade knick-knacks in all the land.

UPDATE 0.6.56: Now with more futile options! I've tried to do a better job of indicating controls and such. I've come up with a solution to a funky collision that's been bugging things for a while. I've also added a volume control function, so you can play on silent. The sound design still needs a lot of work, as do any other things. Feedback is greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your time.
